title: How to Make Hokkien Fried Noodle

steps.headline: Head a frying pan or skillet with a dash of oil.
Chop or crush one clove of garlic and fry in the frying pan.
Beat two eggs in a bowl and add to the garlic and oil.
Add onion, Hokkien Mee and bean sprouts.
Combine water, soy sauce, sugar and pepper to form your seasoning.
Add your selected meat, prawns and seasonings to the frying pan.
Continue to fry until the meat is thoroughly cooked.

text: Head a frying pan or skillet with a dash of oil.  Chop or crush one clove of garlic and fry in the frying pan.  Beat two eggs in a bowl and add to the garlic and oil.  Add onion, Hokkien Mee and bean sprouts.  Combine water, soy sauce, sugar and pepper to form your seasoning.  Add your selected meat, prawns and seasonings to the frying pan.  Continue to fry until the meat is thoroughly cooked.  Add your diced tomatoes.  Serve hot.
